alert.note: Alert for Elko (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 26 at 3:07AM PDT until further notice by NWS Elko
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Elko has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Nevada... Bruneau River At Rowland affecting Elko County. .Warm temperatures will melt high mountain snowpack and increase river flows. For the Bruneau River...including Rowland...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt is expected. * WHERE...Bruneau River At Rowland. * WHEN...From early this morning until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:55 AM PDT Friday the stage was 6.7 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Action stage is 6.0 feet. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 100 PM PDT.
